name: <%= projectSlug %>
description: <%= projectName %> Theme generated via Teka sub-theme generator

scripts.postinstall: npm install browser-sync --save && find node_modules/ -name '*.info' -type f -delete && composer create-project pattern-lab/edition-drupal-standard pattern-lab && rm -rf pattern-lab/source && ln -s ../pattern-lab-source pattern-lab/source && ln -s ../_pattern-lab.htaccess pattern-lab/.htaccess
